name: UIPopoverPresentationController
desc: An object that manages the display of content in a popover.

items.name: var delegate: UIPopoverPresentationControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate that handles popover-related messages.

items.name: protocol UIPopoverPresentationControllerDelegate
items.desc: The methods of the UIPopoverPresentationControllerDelegate protocol let you customize the behavior of a popover-based presentation. A popover presentation controller notifies your delegate at appropriate points during the presentation process. You can use the delegate methods to customize this process and respond to changes dynamically.

items.name: var popoverLayoutMargins: UIEdgeInsets
items.desc: The margins that define the portion of the screen in which it is permissible to display the popover.

items.name: var backgroundColor: UIColor?
items.desc: The color of the popoverâ€™s backdrop view.

items.name: var passthroughViews: [UIView]?
items.desc: An array of views that the user can interact with while the popover is visible.

items.name: var popoverBackgroundViewClass: UIPopoverBackgroundViewMethods.Type?
items.desc: The class to use for displaying the popover background content.

items.name: var canOverlapSourceViewRect: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the popover can overlap its view rectangle.

items.name: var barButtonItem: UIBarButtonItem?
items.desc: The bar button item on which to anchor the popover.

items.name: var sourceView: UIView?
items.desc: The view containing the anchor rectangle for the popover.

items.name: var sourceRect: CGRect
items.desc: The area in the source view in which you anchor the popover.

items.name: var permittedArrowDirections: UIPopoverArrowDirection
items.desc: The arrow directions that you allow for the popover.

items.name: var arrowDirection: UIPopoverArrowDirection
items.desc: The arrow direction in use by the popover.

items.name: var adaptiveSheetPresentationController: UISheetPresentationController
items.desc: The sheet presentation controller the popover adapts to in compact size classes.
